systemProperty.descriptionCdata: 0296f100-11d7-4042-b5e7-b77cacd09fc6.description=This is used in the Savvis/SMA/SVVS SMA Vantive Case Closure.\nTrue, Action Notification will be fired in the Vantive for Savvis IT originationDesk\nFalse, Action Notification will not be fired in the Vantive for Savvis IT originationDesk
systemProperty.name: SMA_VCC_SAVVISIT_ACTION_NOTIFICATION
